title: Implement VCO module
description:
Create VCO (Voltage Controlled Oscillator) class:
- Inputs: pitch (1V/oct), fm (linear FM)
- Outputs: out (±5V saw wave)
- Params: baseFreq (Hz at 0V, default 110Hz)
- 1V/oct: hz = baseFreq * 2^(pitchV)
- Linear FM: hz += fmV * sensitivity

title: Implement ModularProcessor AudioWorklet
description:
Create modular-processor.js with:
- ModularProcessor class extending AudioWorkletProcessor
- handleMsg() for loadGraph messages
- rebuild() for topological sort and input binding (Kahn's algorithm)
- process() to run DSP graph in sorted order
- Soft clipping (tanh) for final output
- Simple sum for multi-source inputs (banana stacking)

title: Implement VCA module
description:
Create VCA (Voltage Controlled Amplifier) class:
- Inputs: in (audio signal), cv (control voltage)
- Outputs: out
- Behavior: out = in * (cv / 5) where 5V = unity gain
- Negative CV values will cut to silence (no rectification)

title: Create main.js AudioContext setup
description:
Create main.js with:
- AudioContext creation (requires user gesture)
- Load AudioWorklet module (modular-processor.js)
- Parse JSON graph from textarea
- Send loadGraph message to processor via port.postMessage()
- Connect AudioWorkletNode to destination
- Error handling and status updates

title: Implement OUTPUT module
description:
Create OUTPUT module class:
- Inputs: in
- Outputs: out (passes through for final mix)
- Simple passthrough that marks the final output point in the graph

title: Implement LFO module
description:
Create LFO (Low Frequency Oscillator) class:
- Inputs: rate (optional CV modulation)
- Outputs: out (bipolar ±5V)
- Params: freq (Hz, default 2Hz), shape (sine/tri/saw/square)
- Bipolar output means VCA cuts to silence at negative values (classic tremolo)

title: Create index.html with textarea UI
description:
Create basic HTML file with:
- Textarea prefilled with sample JSON graph (VCO → VCA ← LFO)
- Start button to initialize audio
- Status display area
- Load the main.js module
